example.parse: (S (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV_PASS+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS فوجئ) (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP-4 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المحاضر))) (S-ADV (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يتهجم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-4)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN احد) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN رجالات) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاستقلال)))))))

arg.g: On one of the men of independence
